name: Jim Clark
text: Preordered a pizza several hours in advance.  I was 30 minutes early to pick it up. The staff was friendly and courteous, they said the pizza was made they were waiting to put it in the oven. Came back and said it would be ready in 10 min. ‚Ä¶More

name: Mark
text: Have been twice now and the food is awesome. And I promise you won't leave hungry. These pizzas are thick! And the pasta portions are very generous!

name: Jazz Bael

name: Avani Shukla
text: Not at all as expected. Cheese pizza was more like dough pizza not cooked well. Too pricey for size. An order of Zappole was complete waste of money.  Was not cooked at all. So chewy n couldn‚Äôt eat at all. Never trying anything from this place ever.

name: Georgia Pearson
text: I only gave it 2 stars because the salads were pretty good and fresh. The zeppoli desert was good but not stand out amazing. The reason we have such a horrible rating is because of the pizza!! The sausage was undercooked and we had to heat ‚Ä¶More

name: Kelly K
text: Great pizza. Love deep dish Chicago style. The cheesy garlic bread was delivered cold & wasn't that good.

name: Christa Duncan
text: I was so tickled to find an Italian beef sandwich around here!  Everything was great, including the bread and side salad.  Our order also included the combo sandwich, meatball marinara sandwich and antipasto salad.  I joined Rosati‚Äôs ‚Ä¶More

name: Kelly Lowe
text: Amazing, authentic Chicago style deep dish pizza. The sauce tastes like an Italian grandmother worked on it all afternoon, the cheese is grated fresh, and the crust is light delicious not dry like some other chains. Worth the drive from South Carolina.

name: Abbey Sikes
text: staff was super friendly! Pizza was amazing. Definitely worth the 20min drive. looking forward to going back.

name: AUGUST SUNDERMEIER
text: My favorite new pizza place. Oh so good! And amazed they had gluten free ones for our guests that are sensitive. Also it‚Äôs a tie between their deep dish and regular crust. We ordered both to compare and the votes were liking both ‚Ä¶More

text: Amazing pizza! We had a classic pepperoni pizza and it was perfect. There was an extra layer of cheese on top of the pepperoni that made the pizza melt in your mouth.

text: I have bout thin crust pizza here several times and am not disappointed.

text: Not worth it in my opinion, but maybe they can get better with time.

name: R T
text: This was amazing.  Ordered a sausage/pepperoni/cheese deep dish.  FANTASTIC.  The cheesy bread was also one of the best i've ever had.  I don't usually write google reviews but this one I had to go out of my way to write.   DoorDash delivery available!

name: Eric Dyer
text: If you're like me, and you like spicy, crunchy, giardiniera. You have to try Rosati's private labeled giardiniera.  I put it on sandwiches, salads, and pizzas and I Love it! Unlike typical supermarket giardiniere, it is not vinegar based so ‚Ä¶More

name: Robyn Moulin
text: Amazing Pizza!! We tried both thin and double pan and they were both amazing.  Moved here 20 years ago from Ohio and haven't found "the" place yet....until tonight. Our new favorite for sure.

name: James
text: The pizza was very delicious. It's unfortunate that I had to wait from 6:09 till 7:39. They were extremely busy on Friday night. I will be very happy to eat their pizza again.

name: Anabel Hernandez

text: Quite possibly the worst alfredo sauce of all time.  It was like garlic water with a hint of parmesan.  The noodles were swimming in it and the pasta was gummy.  The only redeeming quality of the meal was the Greek salad dressing.

text: OMG, Deep dish pizza in Waxhaw. I just had some, it made my toes curl. Rosati's pizza is delicious. I'll Be Back!

text: Being from Chicago and growing up eating Rosati's I was skeptical if this would be authentic. They did not disappoint!  Everything was amazing and the staff was wonderful. If you haven't been I recommend them highly

name: Carlann Frey
text: The deep dish Chicago pizza was excellent! Would definitely eat there again.

name: karen j
text: Food was great! Custom service was great! The seating on the inside is very limited tho. However you can enjoy the seating area outside. I'm originally from Chicago, so we now have a spot to go to and enjoy our food when we not visiting our hometown üòä

name: Tim Staiano
text: Delicious pizza (both styles) and wonderful toppings. I've not had better tasting toppings since before moving to Waxhaw 14yrs ago...

name: Leah Byrd
text: I am not a pizza lover but the Chicago deep dish is something unworldly. I mean with every bite it was a different flavor explosion. We are addicted and now have to set boundaries. Their cannolis had weird green crumbles of pistachio I think but the filling was sooo tasty.

name: Wesley Wilk

text: Fantastic meatball sandwich. French fries, however,  were a ginormous disappointment...frozen crinkle cut and mealy. I hope they will do something about that. Frozen is ok but there are some really good frozen french fries so I am perplexed Rosati's doesn't choose a better one.
